title: Intern
name: Newbie Neil
description: A fresh intern who just learned console.log().

dialog.intro: I... I just pushed to production on Friday. Is that bad?
dialog.win: Wait, I need to check StackOverflow...
dialog.lose: Maybe I should switch to management.

title: Junior Dev
name: Green Gary
description: Still learning the ropes, but eager to prove himself.

dialog.intro: I finally understood how Git rebase works!

title: Senior Dev
name: Sparky Steve
description: Writes code faster than you can read it. Highly caffeinated.

dialog.intro: Your code looks... interesting. Let me refactor that for you.
dialog.lose: Looks like I introduced a regression.

title: QA Lead
name: Bug Hunter Betty
description: She finds bugs you didn't even know existed.

dialog.intro: It's not a feature, it's a BUG. And I'm going to squash it.

title: Database Admin
name: Rocky Rex
description: Protector of the production database. Do not run DROP TABLE.

dialog.intro: Did you sanitize your inputs? My tables are immutable!

title: Product Manager
name: Deadline Dan
description: Always asking for new features yesterday.

dialog.intro: We need to pivot. The deadline is now... 5 minutes ago.
dialog.win: Let's circle back on this next quarter.
dialog.lose: Okay, okay, we'll move that feature to the backlog.

title: System Architect
name: Abstract Alice
description: Sees the matrix. Speaks in design patterns.

dialog.intro: Your implementation is too coupled. Observe the beauty of pure abstraction.
dialog.win: As predicted by my UML diagrams.
dialog.lose: Impossible... a flaw in the system design?

title: CTO
name: Boss Bill
description: The legendary founder. Wrote the core engine in Assembly.

dialog.intro: I've seen technologies rise and fall. Show me your code!
dialog.lose: Here, take the keys to the server room. You're in charge now.
